Sentencas: A catalyst for the direct reforming of methane and simulated biogas has been prepared using a green and low temperature hydrothermal method.
Titulo: Enhanced Methane Reforming Activity of a Hydrothermally Synthesized Codoped Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: The nickel and iron codoped SrZrO3 perovskite shows catalytic activity comparable to 10% Ni/Al2O3, but with an almost 50% saving in nickel content and a significant reduction in unwanted carbon deposition through thermal decomposition of methane and the Boudouard reaction.
Titulo: Enhanced Methane Reforming Activity of a Hydrothermally Synthesized Codoped Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: The use of a catalyst with a low active metal content produced via a hydrothermal route provides an attractive and sustainable method of production of synthesis gas from both methane and biogas for potential use in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Enhanced Methane Reforming Activity of a Hydrothermally Synthesized Codoped Perovskite Catalyst
